content: I tried this so many times. There are always tasks that no matter how I spin it, I’ll hate and I’ll try to defer undertaking. I think that motivation comes from having a big enough reason for what I need to do, and a good dose of discipline. Patience is key. Sometimes I think that I need tricks to keep going just because I lack the patience for my goal, always needing some quick dopamine fix — which ultimately resembles an addiction.
